author: SteveL-MSFT
body: Currently we are only signing the packages and not the contents.  This means that the Windows zip distribution will have issues with anti-malware scanners like Windows Defender.  This breaks our xcopy deploy story.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Does this require signing the content or signing the zip pkg would be good enough?
